dialogue.text: So this song's about this one visual novel I played about a character who realized she was in a video game...
...and wanted the one thing the story wouldn't let her have.
As it turns out, she also was a pianist! She wrote her own song and everything.
...That being said, this one was still a pretty tough arrangement to come up with...
Thankfully, I had an epiphany on just how to go about it!
